scriptures.content: As he passed by, he saw a man blind from birth.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: And his disciples asked him, <crossref let="c" cid="c43009002.1"/>"Rabbi, <crossref let="d" cid="c43009002.2"/>who sinned, <crossref let="e" cid="c43009002.3"/>this man or <crossref let="f" cid="c43009002.4"/>his parents, that he was born blind?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Jesus answered, <woc>"It was not that this man sinned, or his parents, but <crossref let="g" cid="c43009003.1"/>that the works of God might be displayed in him. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: <woc>We must <crossref let="h" cid="c43009004.1"/>work the works of him who sent me <crossref let="i" cid="c43009004.2"/>while it is day; night is coming, when no one can work. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: <woc>As long as I am in the world, <crossref let="j" cid="c43009005.1"/>I am the light of the world. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Having said these things, <crossref let="k" cid="c43009006.1"/>he spat on the ground and made mud with the saliva. <crossref let="l" cid="c43009006.2"/>Then he anointed the man's eyes with the mud
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: and said to him, <woc>"Go, wash in <crossref let="m" cid="c43009007.1"/>the pool of Siloam"</woc> (which means Sent). So he went and washed and <crossref let="n" cid="c43009007.2"/>came back seeing.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: The neighbors and those who had seen him before as a beggar were saying, <crossref let="o" cid="c43009008.1"/>"Is this not the man who used to sit and beg?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Some said, "It is he. " Others said, "No, but he is like him. " He kept saying, "I am the man. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: So they said to him, "Then how were your eyes opened?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: He answered, <crossref let="p" cid="c43009011.1"/>"The man called Jesus made mud and anointed my eyes and said to me, <woc>'Go to Siloam and wash. '</woc> So I went and washed and received my sight. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: They said to him, "Where is he?" He said, "I do not know. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: They brought to the Pharisees the man who had formerly been blind.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: <crossref let="q" cid="c43009014.1"/>Now it was a Sabbath day when Jesus made the mud and opened his eyes.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: <crossref let="r" cid="c43009015.1"/>So the Pharisees again asked him how he had received his sight. And he said to them, "He put mud on my eyes, and I washed, and I see. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Some of the Pharisees said, "This man is not <crossref let="s" cid="c43009016.1"/>from God, <crossref let="t" cid="c43009016.2"/>for he does not keep the Sabbath. " But others said, <crossref let="u" cid="c43009016.3"/>"How can a man who is a sinner do such signs?" And <crossref let="v" cid="c43009016.4"/>there was a division among them.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: So they said again to the blind man, "What do you say about him, since he has opened your eyes?" He said, <crossref let="w" cid="c43009017.1"/>"He is a prophet. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: <crossref let="x" cid="c43009018.1"/>The Jews did not believe that he had been blind and had received his sight, until they called the parents of the man who had received his sight
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: and asked them, "Is this your son, who you say was born blind? How then does he now see?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: His parents answered, "We know that this is our son and that he was born blind.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: But how he now sees we do not know, nor do we know who opened his eyes. Ask him; he is of age. He will speak for himself. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: (His parents said these things because they feared the Jews, for the Jews had already agreed that if anyone should confess JesusGreek him to be Christ, he was to be put out of the synagogue. )
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Therefore his parents said, <crossref let="c" cid="c43009023.1"/>"He is of age; ask him. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: So for the second time they called the man who had been blind and said to him, <crossref let="d" cid="c43009024.1"/>"Give glory to God. We know that <crossref let="e" cid="c43009024.2"/>this man is a sinner. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: He answered, "Whether he is a sinner I do not know. One thing I do know, that though I <crossref let="f" cid="c43009025.1"/>was blind, now I see. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: They said to him, "What did he do to you? How did he open your eyes?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: He answered them, <crossref let="g" cid="c43009027.1"/>"I have told you already, and you would not listen. Why do you want to hear it again? Do you also want to become his disciples?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: And they reviled him, saying, "You are his disciple, but <crossref let="h" cid="c43009028.1"/>we are disciples of Moses.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: We know that God has spoken to Moses, but as for this man, <crossref let="i" cid="c43009029.1"/>we do not know where he comes from. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: The man answered, "Why, this is <crossref let="j" cid="c43009030.1"/>an amazing thing! <crossref let="k" cid="c43009030.2"/>You do not know where he comes from, and yet he opened my eyes.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: We know that <crossref let="l" cid="c43009031.1"/>God does not listen to sinners, but <crossref let="m" cid="c43009031.2"/>if anyone is a worshiper of God and does his will, God listens to him.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Never since the world began has it been heard that anyone opened the eyes of a man born blind.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: <crossref let="n" cid="c43009033.1"/>If this man were not from God, he could do nothing. "
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: They answered him, <crossref let="o" cid="c43009034.1"/>"You were born in utter sin, and would you teach us?" And they <crossref let="p" cid="c43009034.2"/>cast him out.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Jesus heard that they had cast him out, and having found him he said, "Do you believe in the Son of Man?"Some manuscripts the Son of God
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: He answered, <crossref let="r" cid="c43009036.1"/>"And who is he, sir, that I may believe in him?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Jesus said to him, <woc>"You have seen him, and <crossref let="s" cid="c43009037.1"/>it is he who is speaking to you. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: He said, "Lord, I believe," and he worshiped him.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Jesus said, <woc><crossref let="t" cid="c43009039.1"/>"For judgment I came into this world, <crossref let="u" cid="c43009039.2"/>that those who do not see may see, and <crossref let="v" cid="c43009039.3"/>those who see may become blind. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Some of the Pharisees near him heard these things, and said to him, <crossref let="w" cid="c43009040.1"/>"Are we also blind?"
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

scriptures.content: Jesus said to them, "If you were blind, you would have no guilt;Greek you would not have sin but now that you say, 'We see,' your guilt remains.
scriptures.section_title: Jesus Heals a Man Born Blind

n43009035.1.content: Some manuscripts the Son of God

n43009041.1.content: Greek you would not have sin
